text: Hi Everyone! I have a quick question. My theme is submitted and awaiting approval. Can I make changes to that theme or will that bump me back to the bottom of the approval queue?

Hey Sam, if you make changes and resubmit, that will move that item to the bottom of the queue. This is called out here in our marketplace requirements doc: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-requirements#what-is-the-review-process-for-submissions-to-the-marketplace->
